testcase.classname: validating the login for an application
testcase.name: To test login with valid data //can be used to run the same Scenario multiple times, with different combinations of values. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser and go to the login page of order placing site.......passed When user enters a valid username "performance_glitch_user".................passed And user enters a valid password "secret_sauce".............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user should see the "SWAGLABS"........................................passed

testcase.classname: validating the login for an application

testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser and go to the login page of order placing site.......passed When user enters a valid username "standard_user"...........................passed And user enters a valid password "secret_sauce".............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user should see the "SWAGLABS"........................................passed
